help.desc:
Shows a description and format for a command.
Anything in <triangle brackets> is a required parameter, anything in (parentheses) is an optional parameter.

echo.desc: Recreates your message as an Rich Embed.

Echo.desc: Recreates your message as an Rich Embed and deletes your original message.

prefix.desc: Changes the prefix of bot commands for this server(maximum length is 3 characters).

snowflake.desc: Every user on discord has their own set of 18 random numbers. This is your ID or 'Snowflake'. I will DM you your snowflake.

math.desc: Returns the answer to an equation.

eval.desc: Preforms an equation with defined variables.

area.desc: Returns the area of a 2D shape(square, triangle, & circle)

volume.desc: Returns the Volume of a 3D shape(cube, pyarmid, sphere, cylinder, & cone)

root.desc: By default, returns the square root of a selected.

solve.desc: Returns the value for a variable in an equation

vote.desc: Votes for an item on the current poll

periodic.desc: Get information on the Periodic Table of Elements

unban.desc: Unbans a mentioned user from your server
